mapper.insert: insert into fm_product(p_name, p_filename, p_price, p_unit, p_weight, p_delivery, p_package, p_allergy, p_limitdate, p_type, p_tag, p_system_filename, midx_mp) values(#{p_name}, #{p_filename}, #{p_price}, #{p_unit}, #{p_weight}, #{p_delivery}, #{p_package}, #{p_allergy}, #{p_limitdate}, #{p_type}, #{p_tag}, #{p_system_filename}, #{midx_mp})
mapper.select: select * from fm_product a inner join fm_member b on a.midx_mp = b.midx where a.midx_mp = #{midx} and a.p_delyn = 'N'
mapper.update: update fm_product set p_delyn = 'Y' where pidx= #{pidx} and midx_mp = #{midx}
